'''''Minecraft'' x Youtooz''' is an official [[merchandise]] collaboration between ''[[Minecraft]]'' and vinyl figure company {{w|Youtooz}}. The first release (Ender Dragon, Creeper, Wolf) happened on November 3, 2023,<ref>{{tweet|youtooz|1720516200160227451|it's crafting time ‚õèÔ∏è congrats to the winners! üêâ - @StarChicken_ @sketchatunes @Slip_VA üê∫ - @Effect2o @Mindplex8 @RrrabHP ü§Ø - @Jxcaesar_ @bloopthesnoot @Milkbar45 dm us for ur prizes! the @Minecraft collection is now available ‚û°Ô∏è https://youtooz.com/collections/minecraft|November 3, 2023}}</ref> the second release (Warden, Bees, Chickens, Pin Set) happened on April 23, 2024,<ref>{{tweet|youtooz|1780994966145192316|shhhh‚Ä¶ don‚Äôt make a sound or you‚Äôll alert the warden üò≥ the new @Minecraft x youtooz collection drops on april 23rd üêùüêî|April 18, 2024}}</ref> and the third release (Enderman, Zombies, Pin Set 2) happened on September 30, 2024.<ref>{{tweet|youtooz|1838711146070605941|a world where anything is possible‚Ä¶ üòé new minecraft collection drops on september 30th exclusively at @target|September 24, 2024}}</ref>

== Background ==
''Yootooz'' is a Canadian merchandising company, known for producing vinyl figures, similar to {{Wikipedia|Funko Pops}}. Their primary focus is on merchandise of content creators from the platforms [[Twitch]] and [[YouTube]], such as [[DanTDM]], [[Stampy]], [[CaptainSparklez]], [[SeaPeeKay]], and [[Technoblade]]. They have also made merchandise from pop culture franchises, such as ''{{Wikipedia|Avatar: The Last Airbender}}'', ''{{Wikipedia|Godzilla}}'', ''{{Wikipedia|Scream (franchise)|Scream}}'', ''{{Wikipedia|Hazbin Hotel}}'', and ''{{Wikipedia|Arcane (TV series)|Arcane}}''. For some of their licenses, they will also make merchandise based off popular memes within their communities, such as for [[SpongeBob SquarePants]], ''{{Wikipedia|Invincible (TV series)|Invincible}}'', and ''{{Wikipedia|Five Nights at Freddy's}}.''
